H0.text: Which famous stage production, first seen in 1973, contains a scruffily dressed hunchback named Riff Raff. The Rocky Horror Show

H1.text: Which famous stage production, first seen in 1973, contains a scruffily dressed hunchback named Riff Raff. The Phantom of the Opera

H2.text: Which famous stage production, first seen in 1973, contains a scruffily dressed hunchback named Riff Raff. Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street

H3.text: Which famous stage production, first seen in 1973, contains a scruffily dressed hunchback named Riff Raff. Dr Frank N Furter

A4.text: The Rocky Horror Show premiered in 1973 at the Royal Court Upstairs and later transferred to the Chelsea Classic Cinema.

A5.text: Karel Deruwe played Riff Raff in the original 1973 production of The Rocky Horror Show.
